381R/A0/09/700/010.indicator_name: % of planned activities effectively implemented in an annual plan of action with key partners   (AfDB  AUC  AMCOW   ECOWAS  WAHO  ECCAS )
381R/A0/09/700/010.headline: WCARO continued to reinforce its engagement with African Political Institutions such as AU  ECCAS and ECOWAS. A new MoU and a 2-year plan of action were signed with ECCAS covering sectors like Health  WASH  Nutrition and Child Protection. The Office also improved its internal Resource Mobilization systems.
